thread.section_title: BIGWORDS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BIGWORDS.com | bigwords.com
thread.title: Leead

author: Leead
title: Leead
text:
I really like this website. It has been saving me a lot of money during my college years and I have been recommending it to my friends ever since I found out about it. Whether it's buy, rent or sell - Bigwords.com gives you the best results for your match!
The only thing they can improve on is that in the past, you were able to see all the site relevant to your search. Now you only get to see the top one, and you have to "hide" each one manually. Sometimes you rather bundle with one site instead of that, so bringing back the list would be great!
